00025 #ifndef _BASE_ROWVECMATRIXIMPL_
00026 #define _BASE_ROWVECMATRIXIMPL_
00027 
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 
00030 #include <base/MatrixImpl>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace base {
00034 
00035 
00036 //
00037 // The row vector matrix implementation 
00038 //  (stored as an array of Vectors  - which make row swapping
00039 //   fast)
00040 
00041 class RowVecMatrixImpl : public MatrixImpl
00042 {
00043 
00044 public:
00045   RowVecMatrixImpl(Int rows=1, Int cols=1);
00046   RowVecMatrixImpl(const MatrixImpl& m);
00047   RowVecMatrixImpl(const RowVecMatrixImpl& m);
00048   virtual ~RowVecMatrixImpl();
00049 
00050   virtual String className() const { return String("RowVecMatrixImpl"); }
00051   virtual Object& clone() const { return *new RowVecMatrixImpl(*this); }
00052     
00053   virtual void setDiagonal(Real d) throw();
00054 
00055   virtual Vector getRow(Int row) const throw();
00056   virtual void setRow(Int row, const Vector& rowVector) throw();
00057 
00058   virtual Vector getColumn(Int col) const throw();
00059   virtual void setColumn(Int col, const Vector& colVector) throw();
00060 
00061   virtual const Vector& row(Int row) const throw(std::runtime_error);
00062   virtual Vector& row(Int row) throw(std::runtime_error);
00063 
00064   
00065   virtual void resize(Int rows, Int cols, const Real& diagonal=Real(1));
00066 
00067   virtual Real& e(Int row, Int col) throw();
00068   virtual const Real& e(Int row, Int col) const throw();
00069 
00070 
00071   virtual MatrixImpl& operator=(const MatrixImpl& src) throw();
00072   virtual RowVecMatrixImpl& operator=(const RowVecMatrixImpl& src) throw();
00073   virtual RowVecMatrixImpl& operator=(const Vector& src) throw();
00074 
00075   virtual bool operator==(const MatrixImpl& m1) const throw();
00076   virtual bool equals(const MatrixImpl& m1) const throw();
00077 
00078   virtual MatrixImpl& transpose();
00079 
00080 
00081   virtual MatrixImpl& swapRows(Int i, Int j) throw();
00082   virtual MatrixImpl& swapCols(Int i, Int j) throw();
00083   
00084   virtual void getSubMatrix(Int row, Int col, Int rows, Int cols, MatrixImpl& sm) const;
00085   virtual void setSubMatrix(Int row, Int col, const MatrixImpl& sm);
00086 
00087   //  virtual RowVecMatrixImpl  select(const Vector& rowIndices,
00088   //                               const Vector& colIndices) const throw(std::out_of_range);
00089 
00090   virtual MatrixImpl& operator*=(const MatrixImpl& m2) throw();
00091   virtual MatrixImpl& operator+=(const MatrixImpl& m2) throw();
00092   virtual MatrixImpl& operator-=(const MatrixImpl& m2) throw();
00093   virtual MatrixImpl& operator-() throw();
00094   virtual MatrixImpl& operator*=(Real s) throw();
00095   virtual MatrixImpl& operator/=(Real s) throw();
00096 
00097 protected:
00098   typedef array<Vector> RowArray;
00099   RowArray ra;
00100 
00101   void construct(Int rows, Int cols);
00102 
00103 };
00104 
00105 
00106 } // base
